reviews.comment: They promised me a stain removal service, but the stains were still there when I got my clothes back.
Convenient and hassle-free, using this laundry service saved me a lot of time and effort.
Terrible experience. My clothes smelled like cigarettes when I got them back.
I had to wait hours for my laundry to be ready. It was a huge inconvenience.
Horrible experience, my clothes were not even sorted properly and ended up getting damaged.
Convenient and hassle-free, using this laundry service saved me a lot of time and effort.
I'm so impressed with this laundry service. They take great care of my clothes and always go the extra mile.
I will never use this laundry service again after they lost a pair of my expensive pants.
Excellent laundry service! My clothes were ready on time and looked brand new.
